question: What was the global CO2 emissions from fossil fuels and industry in 2023?
source_text: Global energy-related CO2 emissions grew by 1.1% in 2023, increasing 410 million tonnes (Mt) to reach a new record high of 37.4 billion tonnes (Gt).

question: What was the global installed desalination capacity in 2024?
source_text: As of 2024, global installed desalination capacity stands at around 91.5 million cubic meters per day, with contracted projects bringing the total committed capacity to about 105 million cubic meters per day.

question: How many thousand malaria deaths occurred in African Union Member States in 2023?
source_text: According to the WHO, there were an estimated 251 million malaria cases (95% of global cases) and 579,414 malaria deaths (97% of global deaths) in African Union Member States in 2023.

question: What was the worldwide semiconductor industry revenue in 2023?
source_text: Worldwide semiconductor revenue in 2023 totaled $533 billion, a decrease of 11.1% from 2022, according to preliminary results by Gartner, Inc.

question: How many billion layer hens worldwide were kept in battery cages in 2023?
source_text: In total, there are 3.84 billion laying hens worldwide. Within this data, 440 million hens are non-caged (constituting 11.6%), 3.33 billion are caged using the layer battery cage (constituting 86.7%).
